title: When SoloQ is going away forever but you actually like DQ
body:
http://i.imgur.com/MyzN6Pl.jpg

inb4 the shit storm that are solo players downvotes me into oblivion

replies.body:
I enjoy DQ as well. Hell, the fact that I can queue up as two roles is something that got me interested in even wanting to play ranked! Have yet to go into ranked because I want at least 3 roles I can cycle through though.

I've heard of so many different horror stories of old Solo Q ranked because of at minimum "Mid or Feed" being a thing among many others.
DQ is not the same as the new champ and role select.

That is just part of the reason though, I personally would never go beyond a trio queue if I ever went into ranked. Unless I was in a ranked team that is. If it was just the ability to choose two roles then I would probably still have a higher chance of wanting to try out ranked. And with the Normal Draft mode using Dynamic Queue its more seamless trying to get into a match due to how the Queuing works for Draft mode since it works with NCS.

>I enjoy DQ as well. Hell, the fact that I can queue up as two roles is something that got me interested in even wanting to play ranked!

You goddamn mule. That's the reason Riot thinks we are fine with Dynamic Queue.

---

Picking two roles is CHAMPION SELECT.

Playing with or aganist up to 5 morons getting carried by Diamond smurfs is DYNAMIC QUEUE.
Can you at least not act condescending towards someone's opinion? Sometimes I forget where DQ starts and ends.
There is nothing wrong with liking DQ as much as there is nothing wrong with disliking it. Seems like you wanted to stir the pot and get a little circlejerk for some reason.

There's nothing wrong with liking DQ. 

There is something wrong with shafting solo players with it though. 

Riot has done nothing to improve solo experience, and DQ didn't really fix any issues with League, while it presents many more, especially for solos.
I'm an American Muslim and I approve of this message.
